item.description:
On January 18 and 25, Untapped Games will be hosting FREE Standard Tournaments in anticipation of our Gatecrash Prerelease with a booster box worth of prizes on each day to be split among the top winners. For less than 16 attendees, the prize will be split among the top 4 winners. For 16 or more attendees, the prize will be split among the top 8 winners.

On the 25th, we'll be holding our Gatecrash Prerelease later at midnight, so stick around for more fun if you like!

Parking available on site. Feel free to call 401-368-1619 if you have any questions or need help finding us!
item.name: FREE Booster Box Standard Tournament at Untapped Games!
